title: The Moon Moth
description: A short story by Jack Vance, first published in the Galaxy Magazine, August 1961. It has also appeared in Jack Vance's collections The World Between and Other Stories (1965), The Worlds of Jack Vance (1973), The Moon Moth and Other Stories (1976), The Best of Jack Vance (1976), Green Magic (1979), Coup de Grace and Other Stories (2001), and The Jack Vance Treasury (2007).
author: Jack Vance
